pr_title: DHFPROD-3992:Backend work for running the mapping

timeline.bodyText: Why does stepDefinition needs it own code here?
timeline.author: rjrudin

replies.bodyText:
All artifacts are present in base dir except stepdef, hence calling File.walk in case of stepdef,
also we don't want to reload the previously loaded mappings(using REST) using DS.
replies.author: srinathgit

timeline.bodyText: If the purpose of this test is to run a flow and not to test the creation of a step, I think it's better just to add the step to the test flow file.
timeline.author: rjrudin

timeline.bodyText: Can you switch this to use the reference project instead of "run-flow-test"? I'd like for as many tests as possible to use the reference project. Adding a flow there with an entity-services-mapping would be a very useful addition.
timeline.author: rjrudin

timeline.message: DHFPROD-3992:Backend work for running the mapping

timeline.bodyText: Spoke with @sbayatpur , she said DHF 5.3.0 will be supported on ML servers  >=9.0-11 for 9.x and >=10.0-2.1 for 10.x. Hence removed the check.
timeline.author: srinathgit

timeline.bodyText: You can remove this, as I'm just going to end up removing it in 4757 since it involves the filesystem. Can remove the line above it too, though you can leave it if you want and I'll delete it as part of 4757.
timeline.author: rjrudin

timeline.bodyText: Can you remove this line of code? retryLimit isn't used anywhere, no need to set it.
timeline.author: rjrudin

timeline.bodyText: This is great that this is all going away - is there just not a need for StepModel anymore, and Step is sufficient?
timeline.author: rjrudin

replies.author: srinathgit
